input_text:
Job Title: Electrical Estimator - Electrical, Construction

Location: Schaumburg, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
We are looking for a seasoned lead electrical estimator. This person would need to have a minimum of 1-5 years as an electrical estimator. Be familiar with the Chicago market and the connections ( Vendors ) that come with that. Have a sales minded attitude. Be a self starter and able to converse and interact with clients, potential clients and Vendors. Our wheel house is Commercial , Medical, Retail and industrial. No multi family housing or Apartments. Electrical work in both Commercial and Industrial facilities Class A project build outs Design build jobs Fully equipped with all electrical tools and equipment needed for any size commercial job. Warehouse lighting replacement to energy efficient LEDs. Electrical Service MSHA 48 certified Certified Georgia Power Trade Ally - competitive salary - medical, dental, vision - 401k with company match - PTO

Benefits

We are looking for a seasoned lead electrical estimator. This person would need to have a minimum of 1-5 years as an electrical estimator. Be familiar with the Chicago market and the connections ( Vendors ) that come with that. Have a sales minded attitude. Be a self starter and able to converse and interact with clients, potential clients and Vendors. Our wheel house is Commercial , Medical, Retail and industrial. No multi family housing or Apartments. Electrical work in both Commercial and Industrial facilities Class A project build outs Design build jobs Fully equipped with all electrical tools and equipment needed for any size commercial job. Warehouse lighting replacement to energy efficient LEDs. Electrical Service MSHA 48 certified Certified Georgia Power Trade Ally - competitive salary - medical, dental, vision - 401k with company match - PTO

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Alfred.Henley@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : AH17-1796048 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Alfred Henley - Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
